title: I\'ve noticed that the traffic signals no longer flash at all from 11PM to 6AM anymore. Can you tell me why?  Thanks, Joe.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20091004/COLUMNIST/910039961/1092/ARTICLES?Title=Crossroads-What-happened-to-Wilmington-s-flashing-traffic-lights-
